name: Graham Denton
bio: Graham Denton is a poet and an anthologist of children’s poetry. His work has been featured in more than 30 publications. His book Orange Silver Sausage: A Collection of Poems Without Rhymes from Zephaniah to Agard (2009) was shortlisted for the Centre for Literacy in Primary Education poetry award. He also edited the anthology Giving you the ‘Willies’ (Delightfully Devilish Verse … and Much, Much Worse!) (2003). Denton also runs Hands Up Books, the only independent children’s poetry press in the United Kingdom. He lives in East Yorkshire, England.
